subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Georg Streitberger of Austria won the men’s super-G Sunday in Kvitfjell, Norway, earning his first World Cup victory by edging Bode Miller by two-tenths of a second.
snippet: Georg Streitberger of Austria won the men’s super-G Sunday in Kvitfjell, Norway, earning his first World Cup victory by edging Bode Miller by two-tenths of a second.
